text.page:
369
102-185a @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /i ri mi ri/ d+ha da~M me/ ba hu pha la~M b+ha ba tu swA hA/ gos phrugs gcig la lan stong bzlas brjod byas te/ mi ya rabs sam/ slob dpon nam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba cig la byin na zla ba phyed phan chad kyi gos phrugs brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du nor zas sam/ rkang 'gros gang yang rung ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /gos brgya thob pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho//
